author: Simon Difford
description: This layered version of the simple Seabreeze looks great but the layers require stirring together by the drinker to produce a balanced drink.
name: Seabreeze (layered version)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR cranberry juice into ice-filled glass
SHAKE other ingredients with ice and carefully strain into glass to LAYER over the cranberry juice
Serve with stirrer and instruct drinker to mix layers prior to drinking
